rdf:Description.lla:note: Names in italic are repeated: same mariner but different capacity. There's multiple letters attached to this record. John Jones signs his last as "formerly master of Margaret Jane"
A letter by John Jones Parry states that his father David Parry was Master of the ship from the beginning at Aberdovey, but records say he joined in Newport
Became Mate when John Jones Parry was ill, as stated in a letter by John Jones Parry himself.
Left unexpectedly for another ship. Information about him given on a letter by David John Bowen after inquiry by John Jones Parry.
Left unexpectedly for another ship. David Parry's widown (John Jones' mother) inquires about his name on a letter, but nobody can provide it. Place of birth supplied by David John Bowen.
